prereq.note: Merchant partners must have their product data and shopping site reviewed to ensure they meet the minimum requirements to join the program.

step.cmd: : Identify and establish communication with the new partner or affiliate network point(s) of contact.

info.p: New partners can be identified by the Company, Client or requested through an affiliate marketing network.

step.cmd: EM: Create the onboarding task tracker in Notion and make accessible to the team.
step.info:
The tracker will contain the complete list of tasks with owner and due dates. High-level phases of an onboarding project will be completed in Test, Staging, and Production environments, and include the following:
Information Gathering and Research
verify minimum program requirements
collect store contacts, policy information, and art
Product Data Review
ensure feed specification requirements through iterative review cycle
check that data is complete and in acceptable format and structure
Automated Order Placement Feasibility
ensure merchant shopping site or API can be successfully integrated with the order placement system
System Initialization
perform merchant initialization in all internal systems and tools
Product Data Import
ensure delivery method and successful import into the system
Internal Tools Validation
validate store data has populated internal tools as expected
Store Branding and Landing Page Setup
ensure store landing pages, branding, marketing copy, and search terms
Shopping Site Validation
validate all aspects of the store data is displayed as expected and pages function properly
Test Order
place test orders for various product configurations to ensure acceptance by the merchant system

step.cmd: EM: Create ADO onboarding work items for feed analysis, site analysis and system setup.
step.info: From this point, the Engagement Manager will manage the project through to site launch.

step.cmd: Complete tasks for partner integration in the test environment:

substep.cmd: Load product catalog into the database
Build store branding and landing pages on test site.
Build order placement controller and place a test order.

step.cmd: Validate the integration in the test environment.
Push the integration to the production environment.
Place a test order on the live site.
Engagement Manager notifies the partner/affiliate, business contacts, and internal team that the integration is completed.
